# Calculator functions in R



```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(out.extra='style="display:block; margin: auto"', fig.align="center")
```


# Basic calculator functions in R


```{r}
1+1
1-1
4/2
4*2
```


Advanced calculator functions in R
----------------------------------

```{r}
sqrt(4)
cos(2*pi)
abs(-4)
log(10)
log10(10)
```


Using variables
---------------

```{r}
a = 2
b = 3
a*b
```


Using variables
---------------

```{r}
number_of_cases = 10
population = 1000
attack_rate = number_of_cases / population
attack_rate
```
